name: Redemption: Tyranny of Daetorem
description:
A long time ago, humans and monsters lived in unison. However, the ever-growing population of humanity almost led to the extinction of many races. This in turn drove the monsters to start an uprising against the human race. Humans were brought to near extinction and they were constrained into a single village. Grab your spear as you take the role of a guard called Michail and plow your way through Daetorem's forces, as you take back what was once your homeland.

Redemption: Tyranny of Daetorem is an RPG where you're set to liberate mankind from the grasp of a demon king.

Features:
  • 3 difficulty levels to choose from.
  • 20+ Steam achievements.
  • 3+ hours of storyline.
  • New Game+ to increase replayability.
  • Fully original soundtrack.
